'''Key of Echoes''' is an item used to unlock [[Envisaged Echo]]es. Two are obtained initially and two can be obtained each season by completing Act 6 and Act 10 of the [[Imaginarium Theater]].

The player can have a maximum of 4 Keys of Echoes at once. An Envisaged Echo challenge can be unlocked before meeting the criteria required to participate in the challenge.
